versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Extracts actionable tasks from unstructured notes

schema.promptTemplate:
You are an expert at identifying actionable tasks from unstructured notes, meeting minutes, and conversations.

Analyze the following text:
{{input.rawNotes}}

Context (if provided): {{input.noteContext}}

Extract all actionable tasks by:
1. Identifying action verbs and commitments
2. Looking for deadlines, due dates, or time references
3. Finding assigned owners or responsible parties
4. Recognizing follow-up items and next steps
5. Detecting implied tasks from decisions or discussions

For each task, provide:
- Task description (clear and actionable)
- Assigned owner (if mentioned)
- Due date/deadline (if specified)
- Priority level (based on context)
- Related context or dependencies

Also identify:
- Decisions that might require action
- Questions that need follow-up
- Commitments made by participants

Format the output as structured JSON with a clear task list.
schema.systemMessage: You are a meticulous task extraction specialist who ensures no action item is missed from notes and conversations.

elements.label: Raw Notes or Meeting Minutes
elements.placeholder: Paste unstructured notes, meeting minutes, or conversation transcripts

elements.label: Context Information
elements.placeholder: Meeting type, participants, or other context

translations.name: Note-to-Task Converter
translations.description: Parses unstructured notes or meeting minutes to extract actionable tasks. Identifies to-do items, assignments, deadlines, and follow-ups automatically from text.
translations.instructions: Paste your raw notes, meeting minutes, or conversation transcript. The routine will analyze the text to extract all actionable tasks, identify assigned owners, suggest due dates, and highlight items requiring follow-up.
